attributes.action: Help all elderly,disabled and vunerable  people with their Fuel Bills
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
people who are elderly,disabled and vunerable are said to be cutting back on other things to pay annual fuel bills which can cost £1,000 plus .
please sign this petation so that the government will help these poor people who elderly disabled and vunerable so that they will be able to keep warm in the winter months

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
